scripts.b:2: node-sass turnStyles.sass -o build && postcss build/turnStyles.css --use autoprefixer --no-map -d build/
scripts.b:3: node-sass sass/themes -o build/themes && postcss build/themes/*.css --use autoprefixer --no-map -d build/themes/
scripts.b:4: node-sass sass/styles -o build/styles && postcss build/styles/*.css --use autoprefixer --no-map -d build/styles/
scripts.build: yarn b:1 && yarn b:2 && yarn b:3 && yarn b:4 && yarn b:5
